hero.title: Modatepe Restaurant & Accommodation
hero.subtitle: Experience unforgettable moments with our local cuisine and comfortable accommodation service in the magnificent view of Trabzon Ortahisar. Experience our hospitality in a peaceful environment surrounded by nature.

scenic.title: Scenic Location
scenic.description: Our facility is located in one of the most beautiful spots of Trabzon, in a location surrounded by nature.

local.title: Local Flavors
local.description: We serve the finest flavors of Black Sea cuisine with fresh and quality ingredients.

comfort.title: Comfortable Accommodation
comfort.description: A peaceful accommodation in our rooms that blend modern comfort with traditional architecture.

restaurant.title: Our Restaurant
restaurant.intro: We bring together the finest flavors of Black Sea cuisine with modern presentation techniques. Our dishes prepared with fresh and quality ingredients offer an unforgettable experience with a magnificent view.

serpmeKahvalti.name: Traditional Spread Breakfast
serpmeKahvalti.description: Rich breakfast experience per person • Kuymak (cheese fondue), fried eggs • Cheese rolls • Çeçil & braided cheese, black olives, white cheese • Fried potatoes, pickles, seasonal jams • Honey, butter, chocolate • Fresh tomatoes, cucumbers • Samovar tea included. (Minimum 2 people, no children's service charge)

kofteKilo.name: Meatballs by Kilo
kofteKilo.description: Raw or cooked meatballs by kilo. Served with chips and grilled vegetables

accommodation.title: Accommodation
accommodation.intro: Experience a peaceful accommodation in the embrace of nature, in our rooms that blend modern comfort with traditional architecture. Each of our rooms is carefully designed and decorated with comfort in mind.

normalRoom.title: Standard Room
normalRoom.description: Our standard rooms that blend modern comfort with traditional touches. 2 rooms available.

deluxeRoom.title: Deluxe Room
deluxeRoom.description: Our spacious and luxuriously designed room offers extra comfort for our special guests.

normalStoneHouse.title: Standard Stone House
normalStoneHouse.description: Our houses with traditional stone architecture offer an authentic accommodation experience.

deluxeStoneHouse.title: Deluxe Stone House
deluxeStoneHouse.description: Our luxuriously equipped stone house is ideal for large families and special guests.
